dev.nick.imageloader

类 MediaLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.nick.imageloader.MediaLoader
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Forkable<MediaLoader,LoaderConfig>, Terminable, BaseFutureTask.TaskActionListener

    public class MediaLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements BaseFutureTask.TaskActionListener, Forkable<MediaLoader,LoaderConfig>, Terminable
    Main class of MediaLoader library.
